EmailTemplate.description: Distributors of DuPont™ Nomex® Paper and Pressboard
EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Nomex® Distributors for Paper and Pressboard
EmailTemplate.subject: Distributors for DuPont™ Nomex® Paper and Pressboard
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Nomex® Paper and Pressboard.
Our Nomex® Paper products are sold through distributors. Attached you will find a link for companies that distribute our products. (To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.)
http://www2.dupont.com/Nomex/en_US/uses_apps/energy_solutions/where_to_buy.html
Please continue to visit out DuPont websites which provides additional information about Nomex® or Kevlar® as well as other DuPont products.
DuPont Protection Solutions
This source list is designed to present a representative group of suppliers. It may not necessarily include all the companies selling or making these products and is subject to revision at any time. It is not an endorsement of any specific manufacturer.
